author: Michael Goodwin
title: Michael Goodwin: Coronavirus crisis -- Cuomo's baffling nursing home policy and its disastrous results
description: New York's policy is especially odd given that the first large outbreak of the virus in the United States took place in a nursing home.
content:

The letter was heartbreaking as it recounted the death of an 88-year-old woman in a New York nursing home. But it was also angry and accurate about a strange New Yor… [+1309 chars]
